SEARCH
Module org.opengis.geoapi
Package org.opengis.referencing.crs

Interface GeneralDerivedCRS

All Superinterfaces:
CoordinateReferenceSystem, IdentifiedObject, ReferenceSystem, SingleCRS
All Known Subinterfaces:
DerivedCRS, ProjectedCRS
@Deprecated(since="3.1") @Classifier(ABSTRACT) @UML(identifier="SC_GeneralDerivedCRS", specification=ISO_19111, version=2007) public interface GeneralDerivedCRS extends SingleCRS
Deprecated.
As of ISO 19111:2019, this interface is renamed as DerivedCRS.
A CRS that is defined by applying a coordinate conversion to another preexisting CRS. The derived CRS inherits its datum (reference frame) or datum ensemble from its base CRS.
Since:
1.0
